body.p: To his Excelleny B Magoffin Govenor of the state of Kentucky --

The undersigned citizens of Mercer County, very respectfully represent to your Excellency that one Thomas Curtis made an attack upon a boy named Leronzo Faulker of this county a few days since, that he snaped a rifle at said boy. because he was offended at his father and did it without any provacation on the part of the boy whatever. Curtis has been tried before the Police Judge of Harrodsburgh & fined $20_ he replevind same with B. C Trapnell &c security. We understand an application will be made to remit the fine -- We therefore remonstrate against it and ask that this remonstrance be filed & considered when the case is presented, very respectfully Your friends & fellow citizens --
